stimulusHtml: ​A linear function P is used to model the price, in dollars, of used cars as a function of their age t, in years. It is known that P4=7300 and P7=5500. Based on this model, which of the following is true?
choicesHtml: ​For each year that a car ages, its price decreases by approximately 25%.
​For each year that a car ages, its price decreases by approximately 75%.
​For each year that a car ages, its price decreases by approximately $600.
​For each year that a car ages, its price decreases by approximately $1800.
